title: Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the Java view, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
EB: The maximized state of the CVS repository view should be preserved when switching perspectives in the Java view.
SR: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective and observe that the CVS repository view is still maximized.
